title: Sources
text:
Data source used in my project
The data was pulled from the General Social Survey using the gssr package. Data from the 1970s to the 2020s was used to analyze the relationship between the intelligence and education.

title: Intelligence and Education
text:
Does the strength of the relationship between intelligence and education change over time?
Using the 10-item vocabulary test called “Wordsum” as a proxy for intelligence, we produced a series of plots to visualize the change in the relationship between intelligence and education level from 1974 to 2020. 









The strength of the relationship between intelligence (Wordsum proxy) and education seems to be decreasing with time.
